titles: The youngmans careless wooing; and the witty maids replication; all done out of old English proverbs. : to the tune of, Mars and Venus. / This may be printed. R.P.
author: R. P.
publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby at the Golden Ball in Pye-Corner,
notes: Date and place of publication suggested by Wing.
Right side of sheet has title: The witty maids answer.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
